Reviews.Title: “A great stay!”
Reviews.Author: hookedonafeeling
Reviews.Content: stayed july chueca hard location perfect staff incredibly friendly clean booked months advance single wasnt available night stay switched available impressed theyd actually kept notation books months id definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Hostal five minutes' walk to the centre”
Reviews.Author: Olyver_Minu
Reviews.Content: hostal located top floor building close madrid centre plaza clean nice private bathroom perfect short stay city notably free 24h wifi connection staff reception possibility home late staff helpful strongly suggest hostal cheap welllocated accomodation weekend madrid

Reviews.Title: “Okay but wouldn't stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: Morgan F
Reviews.Content: choice hostal 4th choice actually looked booked location fun alternative restaurants market located road block gran vía uncomfortable entire stay friendly staff enter ring doorbell wait door takes time leave leave key front box normal spain leave key front desk bothered youre allowed grab box arent allowed adjust ac temperature freezing hot internet didnt bathroom reviewer walls super thin woken neighbors alarm morning heard suitcases wheeled hall lobby overall staying host familys house walk cracked uncomfortable entire time location price reasonable stay

Reviews.Title: “Value priced basics”
Reviews.Author: twigor
Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful location convenient calle de grand via close metro major sites basic clean offered comfortable bed bathroom difficult manuver performing routine tasks clean mold grout showertub

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location and affordable”
Reviews.Author: maduarte
Reviews.Content: stayed night hostal fifth floor apartment building hotel provide breakfast vending machine bathrooms standard size common europe hotel conveniently located blocks metro station walking distance la gran via la puerta del sol etc staff friendly helped look bank nearby negative cleanliness par found piece gum stuck top bed frame safe coinoperated

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service, cheap and great location”
Reviews.Author: Sarah C
Reviews.Content: stayed night quadruple own bed paid 96 total staying downtown madrid safe 24 hour reception clerks downright friendly sharing tourist information soon reservation called answer question parking vending coffee machine lobby cold heater clerk apologetic clean wifi nice stay thanks service

Reviews.Title: “spotlessly clean”
Reviews.Author: kjh555
Reviews.Content: returned spain week ago spent nights hostal bathroom spotlessly clean shower adequate size wifi location couldnt beat staff nice 56 euronight couldnt pleased try petit dinner block corner im gluten intolerant accommodating food delicious

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean and centrally located”
Reviews.Author: C&B75
Reviews.Content: 3 people 3 twin beds 78 euros clean comfortable beds clean bathroom couple blocks gran via friendly staff forgot toothbrush nice wrapper recommended parking paying 1 hour 2 2 hours limit street 8 pm street parking free 9 am car

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, centrally located, and excellent staff.”
Reviews.Author: Hispanophile46
Reviews.Content: comfortable moderate hostal people helpful kept tidy neat staff truly superlative willing answer questions help stay whenever am madrid location ideal madrid

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff, great value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Nooney_btn
Reviews.Content: friend birthday wasnt expect hostel pleasantly surprised package own bathroom balcony overlooking square friendliest staff couldnt stay comfortable cleaned daily matter time bars clubs fyi vending machine lobby comes handy time didnt leave perfect location amazing value money staff definitely coming strongly advise
